query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Guardando nel suo Figlio con l’Amore 2 che l’uno e l’altro etternalmente spira, 3 lo primo e ineffabile Valore
4 quanto per mente e per loco si gira 5 con tant’ ordine fé, ch’esser non puote 6 sanza gustar di lui chi ciò rimira.
query.result:
**English:**
1 Looking at his Son with the Love 2 that the one and the other eternally breathe, 3 the first and ineffable Value
4 as much as can be grasped by mind and place 5 with such order he made, that it cannot be 6 without tasting of him who contemplates it.
**Malay:**
1 Melihat kepada Putranya dengan Cinta 2 yang dihembuskan oleh keduanya secara kekal, 3 Nilai yang pertama dan tak terlukiskan
4 sebanyak yang dapat dipahami oleh pikiran dan tempat 5 dengan tatanan sedemikian rupa yang dibuatnya, sehingga tidak mungkin 6 tanpa merasakannya bagi siapa saja yang merenungkannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Vedi come da indi si dirama 14 l’oblico cerchio che i pianeti porta, 15 per sodisfare al mondo che li chiama.
query.result:
**English:**
13 See how from here branches out 14 the oblique circle that carries the planets, 15 to satisfy the world that calls them.
**Malay:**
13 Lihatlah bagaimana dari sini bercabang 14 lingkaran miring yang membawa planet-planet, 15 untuk memuaskan dunia yang memanggil mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Or ti riman, lettor, sovra ’l tuo banco, 23 dietro pensando a ciò che si preliba, 24 s’esser vuoi lieto assai prima che stanco.
query.result:
**English:**
22 Now you remain, reader, over your desk, 23 reflecting on what is foreshadowed, 24 if you want to be very happy before you are tired.
**Malay:**
22 Sekarang kamu tetap, pembaca, di atas mejamu, 23 merenungkan apa yang diramalkan, 24 jika kamu ingin sangat bahagia sebelum kamu lelah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Messo t’ho innanzi: omai per te ti ciba; 26 ché a sé torce tutta la mia cura 27 quella materia ond’ io son fatto scriba.
query.result:
**English:**
25 I have set it before you: now feed yourself on it; 26 for all my care is turned to that subject 27 from which I am made a scribe.
**Malay:**
25 Telah kuletakkan di hadapanmu: sekarang makanlah sendiri; 26 karena semua perhatianku tertuju pada 27 materi yang membuatku menjadi penulis.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Lo ministro maggior de la natura, 29 che del valor del ciel lo mondo imprenta 30 e col suo lume il tempo ne misura,
31 con quella parte che sù si rammenta 32 congiunto, si girava per le spire 33 in che più tosto ognora s’appresenta;
34 e io era con lui; ma del salire 35 non m’accors’ io, se non com’ uom s’accorge, 36 anzi ’l primo pensier, del suo venire.
query.result:
**English:**
28 The greatest minister of nature, 29 who imprints the world with the power of heaven 30 and measures time with his light,
31 was turning, joined with that part which is remembered above, 32 through the coils in which he always appears more quickly;
33 and I was with him; but I did not notice the ascent, 34 except as a man notices, or rather, the first thought, of his coming.
**Malay:**
28 Menteri alam yang terbesar, 29 yang mencap dunia dengan kuasa langit 30 dan mengukur waktu dengan cahayanya,
31 berputar, bergabung dengan bagian yang dikenang di atas, 32 melalui lilitan di mana ia selalu muncul lebih cepat;
33 dan aku bersamanya; tetapi aku tidak menyadari pendakian itu, 34 kecuali seperti seseorang menyadari, atau lebih tepatnya, pikiran pertama, kedatangannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 È Bëatrice quella che sì scorge 38 di bene in meglio, sì subitamente 39 che l’atto suo per tempo non si sporge.
query.result:
**English:**
37 It is Beatrice who reveals herself 38 from good to better, so suddenly 39 that her action does not extend itself in time.
**Malay:**
37 Dialah Beatrice yang menampakkan dirinya 38 dari baik menjadi lebih baik, begitu tiba-tiba 39 sehingga tindakannya tidak meluas dalam waktu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Quant’ esser convenia da sé lucente 41 quel ch’era dentro al sol dov’ io entra’mi, 42 non per color, ma per lume parvente!
43 Perch’ io lo ’ngegno e l’arte e l’uso chiami, 44 sì nol direi che mai s’imaginasse; 45 ma creder puossi e di veder si brami.
query.result:
**English:**
40 How much it was necessary for that which was inside the sun where I entered to be shining by itself, 41 not because of color, but because of apparent light!
42 Because I call upon my intellect, art, and experience, 43 I would not say it so that it could ever be imagined; 44 but it can be believed and desired to be seen.
**Malay:**
40 Betapa perlu bagi apa yang ada di dalam matahari tempat aku masuk untuk bersinar dengan sendirinya, 41 bukan karena warna, tetapi karena cahaya yang tampak!
42 Karena aku memanggil kecerdasan, seni, dan pengalamanku, 43 aku tidak akan mengatakannya sehingga dapat dibayangkan; 44 tetapi dapat dipercaya dan diinginkan untuk dilihat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 E se le fantasie nostre son basse 47 a tanta altezza, non è maraviglia; 48 ché sopra ’l sol non fu occhio ch’andasse.
query.result:
**English:**
46 And if our fantasies are low 47 at such a height, it is no wonder; 48 for above the sun no eye has ever gone.
**Malay:**
46 Dan jika fantasi kita rendah 47 pada ketinggian seperti itu, tidak mengherankan; 48 karena di atas matahari tidak ada mata yang pernah pergi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Tal era quivi la quarta famiglia 50 de l’alto Padre, che sempre la sazia, 51 mostrando come spira e come figlia.
query.result:
**English:**
49 Such was not here the fourth family 50 of the High Father, who always satisfies it, 51 showing how it breathes and how it is a daughter.
**Malay:**
49 Begitulah di sini keluarga keempat 50 dari Bapa Yang Maha Tinggi, yang selalu mengenyangkannya, 51 menunjukkan bagaimana ia bernafas dan bagaimana ia adalah seorang putri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 E Bëatrice cominciò: «Ringrazia, 53 ringrazia il Sol de li angeli, ch’a questo 54 sensibil t’ha levato per sua grazia».
query.result:
**English:**
52 And Beatrice began: "Give thanks, 53 give thanks to the Sun of the angels, who has raised you to this 54 sensitive level by his grace."
**Malay:**
52 Dan Beatrice memulai: "Bersyukurlah, 53 bersyukurlah kepada Matahari para malaikat, yang telah mengangkatmu ke 54 tingkat sensitif ini dengan rahmat-Nya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Cor di mortal non fu mai sì digesto 56 a divozione e a rendersi a Dio 57 con tutto ’l suo gradir cotanto presto,
58 come a quelle parole mi fec’ io; 59 e sì tutto ’l mio amore in lui si mise, 60 che Bëatrice eclissò ne l’oblio.
query.result:
**English:**
55 Never was a mortal heart so disposed 56 to devotion and to surrender to God 57 with all its longing so quickly,
58 as I became at those words; 59 and all my love was so placed in him, 60 that Beatrice was eclipsed in oblivion.
**Malay:**
55 Tidak pernah ada hati manusia yang begitu siap 56 untuk pengabdian dan berserah diri kepada Tuhan 57 dengan segala kerinduannya begitu cepat,
58 seperti yang terjadi padaku mendengar kata-kata itu; 59 dan seluruh cintaku begitu tercurah padanya, 60 sehingga Beatrice pun sirna dalam pelupaan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Non le dispiacque; ma sì se ne rise, 62 che lo splendor de li occhi suoi ridenti 63 mia mente unita in più cose divise.
query.result:
**English:**
61 She was not displeased; rather, she laughed, 62 so that the splendor of her laughing eyes 63 distracted my mind, which was focused on many things.
**Malay:**
61 Dia tidak marah; malah dia tertawa, 62 sehingga keindahan matanya yang berseri 63 mengalihkan pikiranku, yang sedang fokus pada banyak hal.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Io vidi più folgór vivi e vincenti 65 far di noi centro e di sé far corona, 66 più dolci in voce che in vista lucenti:
67 così cinger la figlia di Latona 68 vedem talvolta, quando l’aere è pregno, 69 sì che ritenga il fil che fa la zona.
query.result:
**English:**
64 I saw more living and conquering lightning bolts 65 making a center of us and a crown of themselves, 66 sweeter in voice than shining in appearance:
67 thus we sometimes see the daughter of Latona encircled, 68 when the air is pregnant, 69 so that it retains the thread that makes the zone.
**Malay:**
64 Aku melihat lebih banyak kilat yang hidup dan menang 65 menjadikan kami pusat dan diri mereka sendiri sebagai mahkota, 66 lebih manis dalam suara daripada bersinar dalam penampilan:
67 begitulah kita terkadang melihat putri Latona dikelilingi, 68 ketika udara mengandung, 69 sehingga menahan benang yang membentuk zona.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Poi, sì cantando, quelli ardenti soli 77 si fuor girati intorno a noi tre volte, 78 come stelle vicine a’ fermi poli,
79 donne mi parver, non da ballo sciolte, 80 ma che s’arrestin tacite, ascoltando 81 fin che le nove note hanno ricolte.
query.result:
**English:**
76 Then, singing thus, those burning suns 77 turned around us three times, 78 like stars close to the fixed poles,
79 they seemed to me ladies, not freed from dancing, 80 but who stop silently, listening 81 until they have gathered the nine notes.
**Malay:**
76 Kemudian, sambil bernyanyi demikian, matahari-matahari yang menyala-nyala itu 77 berputar di sekeliling kami bertiga sebanyak tiga kali, 78 bagaikan bintang-bintang yang dekat dengan kutub-kutub yang tetap,
79 mereka tampak bagiku seperti wanita-wanita, tidak bebas dari tarian, 80 tetapi yang berhenti dengan tenang, mendengarkan 81 hingga mereka telah mengumpulkan sembilan nada.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 E dentro a l’un senti’ cominciar: «Quando 83 lo raggio de la grazia, onde s’accende 84 verace amore e che poi cresce amando,
85 multiplicato in te tanto resplende, 86 che ti conduce su per quella scala 87 u’ sanza risalir nessun discende;
88 qual ti negasse il vin de la sua fiala 89 per la tua sete, in libertà non fora 90 se non com’ acqua ch’al mar non si cala.
query.result:
**English:**
82 And within one I heard begin: "When 83 the ray of grace, by which true love is kindled 84 and which then increases by loving,
85 multiplied in you shines so much 86 that it leads you up that ladder 87 from which no one descends without ascending;
88 who would deny you the wine from his flask 89 for your thirst, would not be free 90 except as water that does not flow into the sea.
**Malay:**
82 Dan di dalam salah satu, kudengar mulai: "Ketika 83 sinar rahmat, yang darinya cinta sejati dinyalakan 84 dan yang kemudian tumbuh dengan mencintai,
85 berlipat ganda di dalam dirimu bersinar begitu terang, 86 yang menuntunmu naik tangga itu 87 yang darinya tidak seorang pun turun tanpa naik;
88 siapa yang akan menolak anggur dari botolnya 89 untuk dahagamu, tidak akan bebas 90 kecuali seperti air yang tidak mengalir ke laut.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Tu vuo’ saper di quai piante s’infiora 92 questa ghirlanda che ’ntorno vagheggia 93 la bella donna ch’al ciel t’avvalora.
query.result:
**English:**
91 You want to know with what plants is adorned 92 this garland that encircles and beautifies 93 the fair lady who exalts you to heaven.
**Malay:**
91 Engkau ingin tahu dengan tanaman apakah dihiasi 92 karangan bunga ini yang melingkari dan memperindah 93 wanita cantik yang meninggikanmu ke surga.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 Io fui de li agni de la santa greggia 95 che Domenico mena per cammino 96 u’ ben s’impingua se non si vaneggia.
query.result:
**English:**
94 I was of the sheep of the holy flock 95 that Dominic leads along the way 96 where one fattens well if he does not stray.
**Malay:**
94 Aku adalah salah satu domba dari kawanan suci 95 yang dipimpin oleh Dominikus di sepanjang jalan 96 di mana seseorang akan menjadi gemuk jika tidak tersesat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Questi che m’è a destra più vicino, 98 frate e maestro fummi, ed esso Alberto 99 è di Cologna, e io Thomas d’Aquino.
query.result:
**English:**
97 This one who is closest to me on the right, 98 was my brother and teacher, and he is Albert 99 of Cologne, and I am Thomas Aquinas.
**Malay:**
97 Orang ini yang berada di sebelah kananku, 98 adalah saudara dan guruku, dan dia adalah Albert 99 dari Cologne, dan aku Thomas Aquinas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Se sì di tutti li altri esser vuo’ certo, 101 di retro al mio parlar ten vien col viso 102 girando su per lo beato serto.
query.result:
**English:**
100 If you wish to be certain of all the others, 101 follow me with your gaze behind my speech, 102 turning upward along the blessed garland.
**Malay:**
100 Jika kamu ingin mengetahui dengan pasti tentang semua yang lain, 101 ikutilah aku dengan pandanganmu di belakang ucapanku, 102 berputar ke atas sepanjang untaian bunga yang diberkati.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Quell’ altro fiammeggiare esce del riso 104 di Grazïan, che l’uno e l’altro foro 105 aiutò sì che piace in paradiso.
query.result:
**English:**
103 That other flaming issues from the smile 104 of Gratian, who aided both the one and the other forum 105 so that he is pleasing in paradise.
**Malay:**
103 Nyala api yang lain itu keluar dari senyuman 104 Gratian, yang membantu forum yang satu dan yang lain 105 sehingga ia menyenangkan di surga.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 L’altro ch’appresso addorna il nostro coro, 107 quel Pietro fu che con la poverella 108 offerse a Santa Chiesa suo tesoro.
query.result:
**English:**
106 The other who adorns our choir next, 107 was that Peter who with the poor woman 108 offered his treasure to Holy Church.
**Malay:**
106 Yang lainnya yang menghiasi paduan suara kita berikutnya, 107 adalah Petrus yang bersama wanita miskin itu 108 mempersembahkan hartanya kepada Gereja Suci.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 La quinta luce, ch’è tra noi più bella, 110 spira di tale amor, che tutto ’l mondo 111 là giù ne gola di saper novella:
112 entro v’è l’alta mente u’ sì profondo 113 saver fu messo, che, se ’l vero è vero, 114 a veder tanto non surse il secondo.
query.result:
**English:**
109 The fifth light, which is the most beautiful among us, 110 breathes with such love that the whole world 111 down there in the abyss yearns to know the news:
112 within it is the lofty mind in which such profound 113 knowledge was placed that, if the truth is true, 114 no one else has ever risen to see so much.
**Malay:**
109 Cahaya kelima, yang paling indah di antara kita, 110 berhembus dengan cinta sedemikian rupa sehingga seluruh dunia 111 di bawah sana di jurang ingin tahu beritanya:
112 di dalamnya terdapat pikiran luhur tempat pengetahuan yang begitu mendalam 113 ditempatkan, sehingga, jika kebenaran itu benar, 114 tidak ada orang lain yang pernah bangkit untuk melihat sebanyak itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Appresso vedi il lume di quel cero 116 che giù in carne più a dentro vide 117 l’angelica natura e ’l ministero.
query.result:
**English:**
115 Next you will see the light of that candle 116 who down in the flesh saw most deeply 117 the angelic nature and its ministry.
**Malay:**
115 Kemudian kamu akan melihat cahaya lilin itu 116 yang di dalam daging melihat paling dalam 117 sifat malaikat dan pelayanannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Ne l’altra piccioletta luce ride 119 quello avvocato de’ tempi cristiani 120 del cui latino Augustin si provide.
query.result:
**English:**
118 In the other little light laughs 119 that advocate of Christian times 120 from whose Latin Augustine provided himself.
**Malay:**
118 Dalam cahaya kecil yang lain tertawa 119 pembela zaman Kristian itu 120 dari bahasa Latinnya, Augustine mendapat bekalan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 Or se tu l’occhio de la mente trani 122 di luce in luce dietro a le mie lode, 123 già de l’ottava con sete rimani.
query.result:
**English:**
121 Now if you, with the eye of your mind, 122 pass from light to light, following my praise, 123 you are already thirsting for the eighth sphere.
**Malay:**
121 Sekarang jika kamu, dengan mata pikiranmu, 122 berpindah dari cahaya ke cahaya, mengikuti pujianku, 123 kamu sudah haus akan bulatan kedelapan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Per vedere ogne ben dentro vi gode 125 l’anima santa che ’l mondo fallace 126 fa manifesto a chi di lei ben ode.
query.result:
**English:**
124 To see every good thing within it rejoices 125 the holy soul that makes the deceitful world 126 manifest to those who listen well to her.
**Malay:**
124 Untuk melihat setiap kebaikan di dalamnya bersukacitalah 125 jiwa suci yang membuat dunia yang menipu 126 nyata bagi mereka yang mendengarkannya dengan baik.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Lo corpo ond’ ella fu cacciata giace 128 giuso in Cieldauro; ed essa da martiro 129 e da essilio venne a questa pace.
query.result:
**English:**
127 The body from which she was expelled lies 128 down in Cieldauro; and she from martyrdom 129 and from exile came to this peace.
**Malay:**
127 Tubuh yang darinya dia diusir terbaring 128 di bawah di Cieldauro; dan dia dari kesyahidan 129 dan dari pengasingan datang ke kedamaian ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Vedi oltre fiammeggiar l’ardente spiro 131 d’Isidoro, di Beda e di Riccardo, 132 che a considerar fu più che viro.
query.result:
**English:**
130 See beyond, blazing with ardent spirit, 131 Isidore, Bede, and Richard, 132 who in contemplation was more than a man.
**Malay:**
130 Lihatlah di sana, berkobar dengan semangat yang membara, 131 Isidore, Bede, dan Richard, 132 yang dalam perenungan lebih dari sekadar manusia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Questi onde a me ritorna il tuo riguardo, 134 è ’l lume d’uno spirto che ’n pensieri 135 gravi a morir li parve venir tardo:
136 essa è la luce etterna di Sigieri, 137 che, leggendo nel Vico de li Strami, 138 silogizzò invidïosi veri».
query.result:
**English:**
133 These waves return your gaze to me, 134 it is the light of a spirit who, in thoughts 135 heavy with dying, seemed to come too late:
136 it is the eternal light of Siger, 137 who, reading in the Street of Straw, 138 syllogized envious truths.
**Malay:**
133 Ombak-ombak ini mengembalikan tatapanmu kepadaku, 134 adalah cahaya dari roh yang, dalam pikiran 135 berat dengan kematian, tampaknya datang terlambat:
136 itu adalah cahaya abadi Sigieri, 137 yang, membaca di Jalan Jerami, 138 menyimpulkan kebenaran yang membuat iri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 Indi, come orologio che ne chiami 140 ne l’ora che la sposa di Dio surge 141 a mattinar lo sposo perché l’ami,
142 che l’una parte e l’altra tira e urge, 143 tin tin sonando con sì dolce nota, 144 che ’l ben disposto spirto d’amor turge;
145 così vid’ ïo la gloriosa rota 146 muoversi e render voce a voce in tempra 147 e in dolcezza ch’esser non pò nota
148 se non colà dove gioir s’insempra.
query.result:
**English:**
139 Then, like a clock that calls us 140 at the hour when the bride of God rises 141 in the morning to her husband so that he may love her,
142 which pulls and urges one part and the other, 143 sounding tin tin with such a sweet note, 144 that the well-disposed spirit swells with love;
145 thus I saw the glorious wheel 146 move and render voice to voice in harmony 147 and in a sweetness that cannot be known
148 except there where joy is sempiternal.
**Malay:**
139 Kemudian, seperti jam yang memanggil kita 140 pada waktu ketika mempelai wanita Tuhan bangkit 141 di pagi hari kepada suaminya agar dia mencintainya,
142 yang menarik dan mendesak satu bagian dan bagian lainnya, 143 berbunyi tin tin dengan nada yang begitu manis, 144 sehingga roh yang siap sedia membengkak dengan cinta;
145 demikianlah aku melihat roda yang mulia itu 146 bergerak dan memberikan suara ke suara dalam harmoni 147 dan dalam rasa manis yang tidak dapat diketahui
148 kecuali di sana di mana kegembiraan itu abadi.
